title: Inclusive Virtual Distance Education Accessibility Improvement Program

context.additional_context: An after-school learning program for working professionals targeting elementary students from diverse socioeconomic backgrounds, operating flexible schedules using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can independently utilize at least four accessibility tools (captions, voice conversion, zoom functionality, etc.) on a virtual learning platform
Learners can identify at least two learning barriers of peers by applying inclusive teaching principles
Learners can apply at least three technical problem-solving strategies in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

resources: LMS Platform with Built-In Accessibility Features

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
